Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_FILE_SEEK_TYPE

The basic type MILES_FILE_SEEK_TYPE describes the type of seek to perform.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AIL_FILE_SEEK_BEGIN Seek relative to the beginning of the file.
 AIL_FILE_SEEK_CURRENT Seek relative to the current position of the file.
 AIL_FILE_SEEK_END Seek relative to the end of the file.


Group: Memory and File Services
Related Functions: AIL_file_seek_callback
